lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I loan because Kiva works. In the past small loans have been a help to me. Kiva also gets loans to people who need them.
lender.occupational_info: I so all sort of home repairs and carpentrie. I do some commercial work too. I manage some property also.

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: i get joy out of making other people happy, and its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: well i get good grades and am on my school volleyball, basketball, and softball teams.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed throughout my life and I would like to spread the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I am a High School Student, I am also the founding president of STAND: A Student Anti-Genocide Coalition, at my High School.

lender.name: Jean-Francois & Denis
lender.loan_because:
As Canadians, my husband and I feel that we have been very fortunate in this life and have had opportunities that many in other countries may not have had. We believe that if everyone around the world who have been as fortunate, would be willing to help, together, we could make this world a much better place for all. We feel that by sharing some of this good fortune, we are giving others the possibility to achieve financial independence and security, thus, giving others the opportunity to feel or be as fortunate. We chose Kiva, because 100% of the funds go to the people in need.
denis

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want not to be simply good, but good for something.
lender.occupational_info: I study.

lender.name: vernon
lender.loan_because: It's fun to help others
lender.occupational_info: I teach practical English in all forms

lender.name: Dorothy & Davis
lender.loan_because: We started because our son gave us a gift certificate. We continue because we believe this helps.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: Microlending is empowering to the recipients.

lender.name: JASHofAT
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to help others. If I continue to be paid back, I will expand my loans. Yep, better than a bank.
lender.occupational_info: I place computer professionals. If you know of any U.S. based programmers or folks looking for them, put them in touch with me. David@AllenAssociates.net

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: We want to invest in people who want to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We were in business and now are teachers.

lender.name: Miko
lender.loan_because: I believe we live in a world of plenty - I am excited about using technology to find solutions to solve the challenges of economic development.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so. THere are so many who have so much less than I have.
lender.occupational_info: I keep people safe while working on ships and in industry.

lender.name: Shannon and Kenny
lender.loan_because: We understand the importance of helping people become financially independent and increase their self-worth.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: they don't have any money, and we can lend them money, and it's a great idea, and they want money.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to get started with their own buisness
lender.occupational_info: I study development of foods foodstuffs, foodsafty and hygiene

lender.loan_because: I really want to help people and my parents got this for me and i thought it was a great opportunity to help myself become more servant orriented

lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives.

lender.name: Sheree
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with more than I need and want to help others to have at least as much as they need.
lender.occupational_info: I paint in oil and acrylic. Lately I enjoy painting portraits. Previously, I taught elementary school

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I want to change people's lives.

lender.occupational_info: I help companies progress and solve their problems - working with their people

lender.occupational_info: I manage retail sales in my area for a computer hardware company.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupational_info: I use music to help people achieve the best possible life.

lender.name: Sue C.

lender.occupational_info: I teach people to sew and use their computers for machine embroidery.and I sell Viking sewing machines.

lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.loan_because: We want to provide people in developing countries with sustainable ways to grow their communities
lender.occupational_info: I get to wake up and help young men realize the place in the world that God has for them, to invite them in to challenges and adventure, and tell them that the world needs them to be who they are

lender.name: Sam and Dave
lender.loan_because: We're appalled at and embarassed by the current US administration. Participating in Kiva may help counter some of the ill will generated by Bush & Co.

lender.name: Ramona
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of people who are working hard to provide sustenance for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I believe it will make a difference.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I assist teachers and schools were needed.

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: I love to help people and I know that it will help person in need to start a buisness. (please send me any cool info about kiva at www.oldblue7@verizon.net
lender.occupational_info: I mow lawns which will help me in the future.

lender.name: Mollie
lender.loan_because: This was given to me as a gift for Christmas 2007. It's a wonderful gift and I have every intention of 1) lending more and 2) giving this as a gift.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I believe God has called me to help those who need a helping hand to improve their lives. My son Dave gave me a gift certificate to Kiva so that I may do that. He is a blessing to others!

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children that giving to others is important and it makes us feel great. I also appreciate how hard these people are working to make their dreams come true. It's a wonderful thing to be a part of that.
lender.occupational_info: My most important job is caring for my children and husband. They are worth more to me than any amount of money.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: God wants us to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: God told us to be stewards of the earth and at my age, this is how i can accomplish his task for me right now.
lender.occupational_info: My work is purely for the love of my God.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I think small amounts of capital can make a big difference. If you have a bicycle, you can get your goods to market more efficiently than walking. If you have a bicycle and a cart, that's even better. You can carry more goods, or spend more time at the market.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a statistician. I work with sales data from thousands of stores to help companies sell their products more efficiently.

lender.name: Mike & Teresa
lender.loan_because: We enjoy giving to those in need of a helping hand and willing to work their way up.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do... period.
lender.occupational_info: My company helps businesses and organizations grow and succeed by taking advantage of the Internet.

lender.name: Bruce and Sue
lender.loan_because: We believe that Kiva loans, given to people who are willing to work hard, gives them an opportunity to lift themselves out of poverty. It also sets an example for their family and those in their community, possibly encouraging others to do the same.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Somerset MA

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupation: I hope to go into International Development :)
lender.loan_because: I love the feeling of helping others. I think that it is unfortunate that these people don't know how to use their resourses, or can't make anything of them. Living in a poor situation like that, and having well-off people like us do nothing about it breaks my heart. That is why I am so dedicated to helping others!

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: TK
lender.occupation: graduate student in traditional chinese m

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: If I can stop one heart from breaking I shall not live in vain. If I can ease one life the aching Or cool one pain Or help one fainting robin Unto his nest again I shall not live in vain. -- Emily Dickinson
lender.occupational_info: Blogger, teacher, storyteller, artist, trying to support myself by contributing to the web.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the abundance that I have and feel it must be shared

lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large public accounting firm in Chicago, IL.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It feels good.

lender.occupational_info: Ron is a CFO and Noreen is a Public Health Counsellor. We both work in health care for a regional health authority. We have three adult children.

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student of international affairs

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: Because I can, it makes me feel good, and I hope that I can somehow make a small difference in the life of someone who needs the help.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: "sentiment without action is the ruin of the soul."

lender.name: Conservative
lender.loan_because: I am a blessed Conservative and People can help people much more efficiently than governments

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: a leg up can be more valuable than a hand out.

lender.name: Matt

lender.occupational_info: I teach college age students (18-60 year olds) about sociology and urban studies, basically how people make societies and form cities.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: Raising women out of poverty benefits their children, too, and thus benefits a nation.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: I'm just trying to pay it forward. I had many people provide a helping hand to me when I needed it. I have a soft spot for women supporting their children.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired and spend most of my time managing investm.ents and playing with grandchildren

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together...
lender.occupational_info: I look at how a business is operating and I make changes to how they do things to make the business more efficient and profitable.

lender.name: Lili

lender.name: Karen and Ron Cambridge
lender.occupation: service providers for adults with disabilities
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate to have what we do simply in living where we are; a comfortable home and food in our stomachs. We want to share with those who are making the effort but do not have the same opportunities as we do.
lender.occupational_info: We provide a variety of services to individuals who have developmental challenges in the form of programs offered; day (covering life skills), evening (outings), overnight, camping, and travels (social opportunities). We do not advertise. We receive referrals from local organizations and agencies.

lender.name: Edmund
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world one step at a time.

lender.name: Bette
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all people need is a little help to get a big project started. I've had that help in my life and would like to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I help to develop health education materials for doctors, nurses, pharmacists and patients.

lender.name: judith
lender.loan_because: it is good to donate and know exactly where your money will end up
lender.occupational_info: being a homemaker. also make quilts

lender.name: Paula and Paul
lender.loan_because: We know there is a bigger world than where we are and it is important that we care about this bigger world.
lender.occupational_info: In our spare time, we are involved in non profit organizations to do with literacy and hospice.

lender.name: Leonora
lender.loan_because: This was given to me by my son as a Christmas gift. It is fascinating and appealing to be a part of another person's lifting themselves up.

lender.loan_because: I love to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Ben is an account manager Kelly is a church youth leader

lender.name: May all beings benefit!
lender.loan_because: At this very moment, For the peoples and the nations of the earth, May not even the names disease, famine, war and suffering be heard. Rather may their moral conduct, merit, wealth and prosperity increase, And may supreme good fortune and well-being always arise for them. --H. H. Dudjom Rinpoche

lender.name: The Paris Family
lender.occupational_info: Accounting

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Well I just started because I was given a loan thingy as a gift.. But because although money does not provide happiness, it can provide an opportunity for success and fulfillment, which can lead to happiness. And there are a lot of people who need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Western Washington University, just transferred from University of Northern Colorado, majoring in Spanish. I also work at Starbucks and make the best Cappuccinos ever.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I like connecting in this way with other people around the world, and it's a wonderful way to "pay forward" the gifts that others gave me when I was younger.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I am always amazed by how much individuals are capable of achieving.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I and my family have been very fortunate in our lives. We all believe in helping when we can.

lender.loan_because: I want to help people get out of the cycle of poverty.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful opportunity for me to help needy people as a small repayment for all of good things that have happened to me.

lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student in special education and applied behavior analysis at the University of Washington. I want to be an autism consultant.

lender.loan_because: we should

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: I'm just helping out others like Jesus told us to. It's a privilege to help out people who are trying to help themselves. I have been helped out many times in my life and am glad to help others out now.
lender.occupational_info: Im a fellow entrepreneur.

lender.name: Popi & Nana & Shay
lender.loan_because: "Give someone a fish they will eat for a day. "TEACH" that same person to fish, they will eat for life." At some time a hand up is all any of us need.
lender.occupational_info: Popi: Maintenance man Nana: Registered Nurse (Hospice) Shay: Her job is to inspire Popi & Nana

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my business and want to help other entrepreneur 's. like myself, to get their business off the ground.
lender.occupational_info: I sell insurance and investments to senior citizens.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: It's empowering for those in need. I care, darnit!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher. I give everyday, in every way. Sometimes it's easy and sometimes it's not. Regardless, it's important, so I choose to do it.

lender.name: DayandSlobotski
lender.loan_because: We loan beacause we like to help people and Kiva gives us a chance to help people all over the world. It is a small world, afterall.
lender.occupational_info: Grandma and Granpa, here in our family photo, are busy with retired life. Kent and Sandy are teachers. Our 5, soon to be six, with David and Holly's marriage this year, children are just remarkable people. Maggie is a chemist, David works for InfoUSA. Garrett is a machinist. Matt will be a firefighter soon. And, our youngest, Brian, hopes to be an architect someday. For now, he helps people by showing them how to live life with muscular dystrophy.

lender.name: robin
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to contribute to another person's happiness, dreams, and future successes.
lender.occupational_info: I'm living my dream...I do make up for a wide range of clients including cosmetic advertising, beauty/fashion editorial, commercials, and celebrity.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Just trying to give a little help where it's really needed.
lender.occupational_info: Manage a network of computers. Information Security Officer for a government institution.

lender.name: Michael & Joyce
lender.loan_because: We have been fortunate in our life and now wish to share with enterprising individuals that can benefit from some of what we can afford to contribute.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for the U. S. Government for over 30 years and have traveled the world. My wife and I value free enterprise and individuals' motivation to earn a living through their own efforts.

lender.name: Matt, Maja and Angelo
lender.loan_because: Everybody should!
lender.occupational_info: Design and Manage International Relief and Development programs

lender.name: Keegan Cooke
lender.loan_because: I see it as repaying a loan that the world has given me. I was born with resources that most of the world doesn't have, simply out of luck. It is my responsibility to do what I can to enable others to make a better life for themselves and those they love.

lender.loan_because: I want to help!

lender.name: Emaginuity
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: people need the help. I think everyone could give a little and the world would just plain be a better place. Just because I was lucky to be born where I was doesn't mean I should take that for granted. And I lost my heart in Africa when I visited. I met the most wonderful spirits there.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit organization that works for equality for all people.

lender.name: goshen
lender.loan_because: it is the God thing to do

lender.name: stacy
lender.loan_because: I really love to see people have the opportunity to have their own business that they can take great pride in.

lender.name: Benjamin & Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I am my brother's keeper

lender.name: Kritiya

lender.occupational_info: I am helping change how health care is delivered so that everyone has access to quality care.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person. Mother Theresa

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: it is one way to make the world a little better by having faith to help someone realize their dreams and accomplish their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Analyst in the residential mortgage department for a major United States based bank.

lender.name: denise
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to insure that administrative costs don't eat up your donation. I love following the progress of the specific person I helped. Individiual connections do matter. And finally, I believe in this as a workable solution that bypasses large bureaucracies and gets down to a grass roots level of giving. And most importantly, I trust that President Bill Clinton has once again fostered another new trend in helping others in the world get a leg up...and in the process spread goodwill from this very generous country of ours to others less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in people and enterprises...and love to travel and interact with many cultures...

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: Help only works if its passed on down the line (as we receive, so should we give).

lender.name: Hanny
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important for people to be generous with each other.

lender.name: Troy

lender.occupational_info: We work in our communities to promote environmental awareness and child health.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: it helps other people and it's really cool to see these people's businesses grow.

lender.name: Blaze
lender.loan_because: Because it gives others opportunities they may not have!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Marlene

lender.occupational_info: I am a mom of 5 wonderful kids and I am married to the most wonderful man. I don't have much but when ever I can I will loan someone the little bit of money I have...I believe to help those in need if we can do it why not!!!!!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to improve their lives and I have faith that their lives will change for the better... so why not help?

lender.name: hayley
lender.loan_because: i enjoy it!

lender.loan_because: Steve, Julie, Austin, Nick & Chelsea

lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help entrepreneurs/people who help themselves.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Raj
lender.loan_because: I saw Kiva featured on CNBC and it really motivated me. I have owned multiple businesses through my career and I know the struggle to get a loan in the U.S.A. I also know how important Entrepreneurship plays in the role of a developing nation. Those two things along with the fact of just being able to help people out of poverty; help people achieve a level of independence; and play a small role in motivating an economy is what has urged me to join Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am self-employed in the restuarant industry and also am very active in real estate and the financial markets.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I have abundance and want to create that opportunity for others.
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for a cleints satisfaction with what we sell and do.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: iam an old man on a fixed income but i have a few dollars to spare and this seems to be a good place to use them.
lender.occupational_info: Old man, double amputee in a wheel chair. Watch TV and play on computer.

lender.name: Jim Page
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I run a small company
